FuncDef: This command instructs the system to redirect traffic to the corresponding PXC interface associated with the configured Forwarding Path Extension (FPE) when the destination IP address matches the configured tunnel-termination IP address. The IP address is also registered, which enables the system to respond to ICMP packets directed to it.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the non-system IPv4 or IPv6 address that terminates the VXLAN.
Specifies the FPE identifier associated with the PXC port or LAG that will process and terminate the VXLAN. Values-1 to 64.
